column4: Howcome, when I do sudo chmod +x hldsupdatetool.bin, it works, then i do, ./hldsupdatetool.bin it says no file or command found. Please help =)
what does this command output: ls -l hldsupdatetool.bin
hldsupdatetool.bin: ELF 32-bit LSB executable, Intel 80386, version 1 (SYSV), dynamically linked (uses shared libs), stripped
not by default, but no-one stops you from installing webmin for http control or xfce (xubuntu) for desktop view :)
as I said, a lot of window and desktop managers, some fast and light in functions, some huge and big in features :)
then try again: sudo linux32 ./hldsupdatetool.bin or linux32 sudo ./hldsupdatetool.bin
do I run linux32 infront of all my commands?
probably, doesn't hurt to try with/without it :)
If I want a program to extract to banshee/hlds, is that what I type, or is it like home/hlds
